CustomField.description: This field controls the visibility of dynamic action of "Request Re-evaluation" button on Assessment record detail lightning page.
CustomField.formula: AND ( OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'KPI_Assessment', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Call_Quality_Assessment' ), TODAY() - DATEVALUE( Date_Time_of_the_Evaluation__c ) <=30, Is_Viewed_By_Case_Owner__c , Re_Evaluation_Requested_Count__c < 2, NOT (ISPICKVAL ( Re_Evaluation_Status__c , 'Requested') ) )
CustomField.label: Display Re-evaluate Request Button?
